features: 6 CUBE 12 TIER 24 PAIRS SHOE RACK: Unzipe 12 Tiers shoe rack provides a large space to store shoes, the size of each cube is (WxHxD) 15.75x11.81x11.81 inch, maximum capacity of 24 pairs of shoes; it‘s a great shoe rack to save a family both men women and kids' shoes, from loafers and boots to heels and flip-flops.

MULTI-PURPOSE STORAGE: Take this DIY cube storage organizer enables you not only to store shoes but different kinds of items, such as clothes, yarns, accessories, bedding and blanket, toys for kids, cables, etc. And you can also classify items for easy access and use next time.

THE CLEVER DESIGN: This cube shoes rack in flexible shape and modern design fits in any room, the colors we design are high-grade gray and dark brown, which are classic and calm, and are subtly blended with your home decor. Waterproof and dustproof Panels and the Anti Rust Alloy Ring on the door are easy for you to open and use.

EASY TO ASSEMBLE: It will not spend you half an hour to install the shoe storage cabinet with doors system. With the great help of the wooden hammer to rap the connector, it's really sturdy and tight. If you are very keen on DIY, you can make your favorite molding to match the needs of the scene, this just for cubes above 6.

STRONG AND STURDY: These plastic shoe rack for entryway and closet is constructed sturdy steel frame and PP plastic sheet, each cube supports hold up to 22LBs/10KG. What amazing is it fits perfect of 11” & 12” fabric storage cube bins
body.description: UNZIPE TIP Before installation, please check to confirm the number of accessories to ensure the complete product received.During assembly, make sure the corners of the panel are fully inserted into the bottom of the connector for added stability.For safety, please be sure to use the included anti-tip strap to secure the shoe rack cabient to the wall. For safety reasons, do not allow children to climb or play on the shoe cabinet.Avoid overloading each cubbyDo not place the organizer outdoors for extended periods to prevent damage from sunlight and weathering.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: UNZIPE 6 Cube Shoe Rack, Shoe Organizer with Doors, 24 Pair Plastic Shoe Storage Cabinet, for Bedroom, Entryway Space Adjustable Panel removable for space adjustable: with panel for flats, slippers etc, without middle spacer, for storaging high heels, boots etc. Waterproof Material The panels are made of flexible waterproof plastic to protect the unit from water and dust. Easy caring, just wipe it with a wet cloth Two Method Door Openning The installation method of the door supports opening up or opening down, decide as you like. Transparent door for quick and easy access to shoes Easy Caring Even if your shoe soles are stained with dust, saving on this shoe rack cabinet is still easy to clean, just a damp cloth to wipe gently Important: Please use the hammer to make sure that every panel is fully locked in the deepest layer of the connector after finishing every layer assembling.

Package Included 20 x PP Panels A (15.75x11.81") 9 x PP Panels B (11.81x11.81") 6 x Door Panels C (15.75x11.81") 20 x Two side buckle 28 x Connector 1 x Wooden Hammer 1 x User Manual Each cubby max load 22lb(10kg), Do not overload this shoe rack organizer. UNZIPE TIP Before installation, please check to confirm the number of accessories to ensure the complete product received.During assembly, make sure the corners of the panel are fully inserted into the bottom of the connector for added stability.For safety, please be sure to use the included anti-tip strap to secure the shoe rack cabient to the wall. For safety reasons, do not allow children to climb or play on the shoe cabinet.Avoid overloading each cubbyDo not place the organizer outdoors for extended periods to prevent damage from sunlight and weathering.
Multi-purpose Plastic Modular Organizer Great for Shoes, Clothes, Pants, Bags, Yarn Organizer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice shoe organizer at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: A little tricky to assemble, but love the low price! Fits all 16 pairs of shoes. Looks nice and takes up minimal space - fits perfectly in the space where we were piling up a bunch of shoes - LOL! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I fit just about 2 pairs in each one & it’s very sturdy because I have a lot of platform shoes & it hasn’t caved in… was also very easy to build on my own, 10/10

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for shoes
reviews.reviewText: This is great for my shoes. I had one left empty I used for Christmas sweaters. It was a little difficult to put together. It is not meant to be moved frequently as it can come apart. I put mine in the closet as 2 rows of 4 and it fit great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my boots & shoes
reviews.reviewText: We bought this to keep the dogs from carrying our shoes away and it works great! Easy to assemble and lightweight. It does come apart easily and the pieces are hard plastic so you want to keep it in a spot where its kept away from small children (toddlers) & animals just to be safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love it
reviews.reviewText: It takes a good while to build but once it’s built it looks really nice. Highly suggest taking your time when building it, the instructions are not super clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Somewhat difficult to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This took me multiple days to assemble, a little frustrating. Once I did it has been decent, however some of the “shelves” dislodge from time to time and need readjusting. Just ok

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This organizer is great for my needs! I wanted something for my collection of Crocs. They are lightweight, so I didn't need anything heavy duty! And the white goes with my bedroom furniture! It was easy to put together, but I changed the bottom pieces so they would lie flat on the carpet, therefore easier to move around!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great storage for the money.
reviews.reviewText: This unit is easy to assemble by almost anyone…I’m a 75 year old woman and is relatively sturdy. I had purchased a covered shoe rack that zipped on both sides less than 2 yrs ago, but that material began to disintegrate and ripped, so I went in search of a shoe wrack and storage to replace it. So far so good. I have 6 lbs worth of folded sweaters and hoodies in a storage bag on top of this unit that has boots and shoes in each of the cubes. I love this purchase and recommend for bedrooms, mudrooms, small kids toys and of course shoes. Well worth money paid.
